org.springframework.data.repository.core

接口 EntityInformation<T,ID>

  • 所有超级接口:
    EntityMetadata<T>
    所有已知子接口:
    RedisEntityInformation<T,ID>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractEntityInformation, DelegatingEntityInformation, MappingRedisEntityInformation, PersistableEntityInformation, PersistentEntityInformation, ReflectionEntityInformation

    public interface EntityInformation<T,ID>
extends EntityMetadata<T>
    Extension of EntityMetadata to add functionality to query information of entity instances.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ID getId(T entity)
      Returns the id of the given entity or null if none can be obtained.
      Class<ID> getIdType()
      Returns the type of the id of the entity.
      default ID getRequiredId(T entity)
      Returns the identifier of the given entity.
      boolean isNew(T entity)
      Returns whether the given entity is considered to be new.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.core.EntityMetadata

        getJavaType

        Returns whether the given entity is considered to be new.
        参数:
        entity - must never be null
        返回:

ID getId(T entity)
        Returns the id of the given entity or null if none can be obtained.
        参数:

      • getRequiredId

        default ID getRequiredId(T entity)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the identifier of the given entity.
        参数:
        entity - must not be null.
        返回:
        the identifier of the given entity
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case no id could be obtained from the given entity
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
